\subsection{Comma Category}
\begin{definition}[Comma Category\index{Comma Category}]
  For categories $A, B, C$ and functors $F:A\to C, G:B\to C$, the comma
  category $(F\downarrow G)$ consists of:
  \parencite{adamek_herrlich_strecker:joy_cats}
  \begin{itemize}
    \item Objects:\\
      $(a, f, b), \ (\forall a\in A,\ b\in B,\ f: F(a) \to
        G(b))$
    \item Morphisms:\\
      $(g, h) : (a, f, b) \to (a', f', b'), \ (\forall g: a \to a',\ h: b\to
        b')$\\
      Such that the following diagram commutes:
      % https://q.uiver.app/?q=WzAsNCxbMCwwLCJGKGEpIl0sWzEsMCwiRihhJykiXSxbMCwxLCJHKGIpIl0sWzEsMSwiRyhiJykiXSxbMCwxLCJGKGcpIl0sWzIsMywiRyhoKSIsMl0sWzAsMiwiZiIsMl0sWzEsMywiZiciXV0=
      \[\begin{tikzcd} {F(a)} & {F(a')} \\
        {G(b)} & {G(b')}
        \arrow["{F(g)}", from=1-1, to=1-2]
        \arrow["{G(h)}"', from=2-1, to=2-2]
        \arrow["f"', from=1-1, to=2-1]
        \arrow["{f'}", from=1-2, to=2-2]
      \end{tikzcd}\]
  \end{itemize}
\end{definition}

\begin{example}
  \begin{gather*}
    % https://q.uiver.app/?
    \begin{tikzcd}[ampersand replacement=\&]
      {1_A} \& {F(1_A)} \& {G(1_B)} \& {1_B} \\
      {0_A} \& {F(0_A)} \& {G(0_B)} \& {0_B}
      \arrow[""{name=0, anchor=center, inner sep=0}, "{f_A}", from=2-1, to=1-1]
      \arrow[""{name=1, anchor=center, inner sep=0}, "{f_B}"', from=2-4, to=1-4]
      \arrow[""{name=2, anchor=center, inner sep=0}, "{F(f_A)}", from=2-2, to=1-2]
      \arrow["\alpha"', from=2-2, to=2-3]
      \arrow["\beta", from=1-2, to=1-3]
      \arrow[""{name=3, anchor=center, inner sep=0}, "{G(f_B)}"', from=2-3, to=1-3]
      \arrow[draw={rgb,255:red,92;green,92;blue,214}, dotted, from=2-1, to=2-2]
      \arrow[draw={rgb,255:red,92;green,92;blue,214}, dotted, from=1-1, to=1-2]
      \arrow[draw={rgb,255:red,214;green,92;blue,92}, dotted, from=2-4, to=2-3]
      \arrow[draw={rgb,255:red,214;green,92;blue,92}, dotted, from=1-4, to=1-3]
      \arrow[draw={rgb,255:red,92;green,92;blue,214}, shorten <=3pt, shorten >=24pt, dotted, from=0, to=2]
      \arrow[draw={rgb,255:red,214;green,92;blue,92}, shorten <=3pt, shorten >=24pt, dotted, from=1, to=3]
    \end{tikzcd}\\
    (F\downarrow G)\ \ =
    % https://q.uiver.app/?q=WzAsMixbMCwwLCIoMF9BLFxcYWxwaGEsMF9CKSJdLFsxLDAsIigxX0EsXFxiZXRhLDFfQikiXSxbMCwxLCIoZl9BLGZfQikiXV0=
    \begin{tikzcd}[ampersand replacement=\&]
      {(0_A,\alpha,0_B)} \& {(1_A,\beta,1_B)}
      \arrow["{(f_A,f_B)}", from=1-1, to=1-2]
    \end{tikzcd}
  \end{gather*}
\end{example}
